Oct. 31, 1936 D West Riding Contest (2nd Section)
West Riding Contest (2nd Section) 20 Test Piece Contest West Riding Contest west-riding-contest-2nd-section
Recollections of Bellini (arr. Rimmer)
Town Hall, Guiseley March contest held in conjunction with Section 1 - 1st Bradford City, 2nd Flockton, 3rd Ossett. 8 bands competed.
Jan. 2, 2014, 2:53 p.m. Feb. 18, 2016, 4:11 p.m.
1 Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band Joseph Elliott
2 Bradford Victoria Tom Atkinson
3 Yeadon Old Band Walter Jackson
Unknown Result Guiseley Brass Band W. Stevenson
Unknown Result Silsden Town Band F. Hillary
Unknown Result Baildon James Wood
Unknown Result Low Moor Jack Smith
Unknown Result Altofts and Normanton Band G. Walsh
